resources.string:
Compatibility updates for Android 15 & 16
 Optimized loading messages in conversations
 Changed the logic of styles
 The selection of primary colors has been expanded, and you can now specify your own color
 Changed colors of context action modes
 Message time in the properties dialog now includes seconds
 The ‘Move items into the Recycle Bin instead of deleting’ option is now enabled by default
 The ‘Hide the top app bar when scrolling’ option is hidden because it does not work correctly on newer versions of Android
 Fixed display of unread notifications in conversations
